agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Energy Resources TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Monday, March 25, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Chris Paddie HB 1522 Paddie | et al. Relating to a prohibition against covenants not to compete for independent contractors in connection with oil and gas operations. HB 2942 Guillen Relating to the adoption and enforcement of reclamation standards for certain sand mining operations; authorizing a fee. HB 3246 Darby | et al. Relating to treating and recycling for beneficial use certain liquid or semiliquid waste arising out of or incidental to drilling for or producing oil or gas. HB 3838 Bailes Relating to a disclosure in certain offers to purchase or lease a mineral or royalty interest. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
